summary: New Race geared towards being a hunter, with special abilities such as waterbreathing, detect life, and clairvoyance. This mod adds an new race as well as special gear and a bow.
descriptionHtml: This mod allows you to play as a new race, the Hunter. The Hunter is a slightly overpowered race that has special abilities built in, such as clairvoyance, detect life, and waterbreathing to help you become the ultimate weapons. The mod not only adds a new playable race, but also adds a set of armor and a bow for you to use. Skills such as Archery and Sneak have been greatly increased compared to the initial value. Please comment and leave suggestions because this is my first mod.
author: Evyn Soileau
